title: Remove fake tip element from page

requirements.text: Remove or hide the tip/notification element located at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1] that displays fake or unwanted content

quotes: Don't need this tip of  fake things

acceptanceCriteria: The tip element identified by the XPath is no longer visible on the page
No fake content displays in that location
The removal does not break the layout or functionality of surrounding elements

constraints: Only modify the specific element identified by the XPath expression
Do not alter the Layout header navigation or other core UI components
nonGoals: Removing other notification or tip elements not specified by the user
